overview:
David Mitroff, Ph.D. is a relationship manager, sales leader, and consultant who specializes in using new technology to expand brand awareness, strengthen customer loyalty, streamline business processes and increase revenues.

David leverages his extensive educational background, which includes a Ph.D. in Clinical Psychology with coursework in Business Administration, Legal Studies, and Marketing in consultative positions for diverse organizations such as LexisNexis, United Healthcare Group, Providian Financial Corporation, Nordstrom, and the YMCA.
